Description:
The FHIR CarePlan resource is a broad container for summarizing the plan of treatment for a patient. It includes links to the Condition Resource (the patient's long term Problem List) and the Goal Resource (the patient's longitudinal goals) as well as in-line detail about upcoming appointments and upcoming orders.

This resource is designed for stating specific activities related to a single patient, rather than generic protocols for condition treatment. This is implemented as a patient-level resource, so a patient will always have exactly 1 longitudinal CarePlan, which contains the most up-to-date information regarding their care.

The search interaction enables the lookup of one or more CarePlan resources, filtered by the specified parameters.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Type of plan. 38717003 should be used to search for longitudinal care plans.
In addition, category type "assess-plan" is always included in search results.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Patient FHIR resource ID for the patient associated with the care plan.
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Patient FHIR resource ID for the patient associated with the care plan.
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

CarePlan.Name: CarePlan
CarePlan.Description: An instance of the R4 CarePlan resource.

activity.Name: activity
activity.Description: Actions to occur as part of the care plan.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
Order or procedure code.
</br></br>
This element is only returned for activities with a detail kind of "ServiceRequest".

kind.Name: kind
kind.Description:
Always one of the following values:
  • Appointment: when this activity is a scheduled appointment
  • ServiceRequest: when this activity is an upcoming order.

scheduledPeriod.Name: scheduledPeriod
scheduledPeriod.Description: Appointment period (uses the linked appointment for orders).

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Appointment status or order request status.
Appointment status will always be one of the following values:
  • scheduled
  • completed
  • in-progress
Order status will always be one of the following values:
  • not-started
  • scheduled
  • completed
  • cancelled
  • unknown

addresses.Name: addresses
addresses.Description: The list of health issues this longitudinal care plan addresses.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Type of plan. 38717003 should be used to search for longitudinal care plans.
In addition, category type "assess-plan" is always included in search results.

goal.Name: goal
goal.Description: Goals for this longitudinal care plan.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: For longitudinal care plans, this always equals "plan".

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this care plan.

text.Name: text
text.Description:
This element is available starting in the August 2021 version of Epic.

The patient's longitudinal care plan formatted as an XHTML fragment.
